title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the PhishingSimulator platform, including features, functionality, integrations, security considerations, compliance requirements, and data privacy regulations. Define the target audience, user roles, and access controls. Outline the desired user experience and user interface requirements. Identify potential integrations with existing systems or third-party services. Specify the required infrastructure, hosting, and deployment considerations. Address data storage, backup, and retention policies. Determine reporting and analytics requirements. Establish performance, scalability, and availability targets. Define the project timeline, milestones, and resource requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components, as well as the communication and data flow between them.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the PhishingSimulator platform, including the admin dashboard, employee interfaces, and reporting features.

title: Implement Phishing Simulation Engine
description: Develop the core phishing simulation engine, including the ability to create personalized, context-aware phishing attempts, track employee responses, and generate reports.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing and managing employee data, phishing simulation data, and reporting data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure the platform is secure and compliant with relevant regulations, including data encryption, access controls, and audit logging.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the PhishingSimulator platform, including automated testing, building, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Define a comprehensive testing strategy and develop test cases to ensure the PhishingSimulator platform meets all requirements and functions as expected.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user documentation, training materials, and support resources to assist administrators and employees in effectively using the PhishingSimulator platform.
